author: cam
msg: 1. Ensure the animation engine of an SVG 1.2 resource document does not
prevent the document from being GCed.

author: jvanzyl
msg: o just run the depoy, the site stuff should be done as part of release but separate as it pulls in so many things, can be so different
and I just had it hang twice on me while doing something and I would rather have it be a separate part of the process. If the site deployment
fails I don't want the release of the artifacts to fail.
